Description: Ring foot and wall sherd (mended from two fragments) of Attic black-glazed pottery skyphos of Attic type; glazed black on interior and exterior; scraped line at junction of wall and foot; reserved: resting surface and underside; two small concentric circles painted on underside; inscription cut under foot.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1284)
